author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Having trouble on HTDW edx problem
question:
Hello,
I'm re-working the Countdown problem for HTDW and my tests seem to pass, but all I get when I run the program is a 0 that doesn't change.
Could anyone tip me off to where I'm going wrong in the program, and what other errors I might be making?
Greatly appreciate it
;; A countdown starting from 9 going to 0

(@htdw Countdown) ;(give WS a better name)

;; =================
;; Constants:
(define WIDTH 400)
(define HEIGHT 600)
(define CTR-X (/ WIDTH 2))
(define CTR-Y (/ HEIGHT 2))
(define MTS (empty-scene WIDTH HEIGHT))
(define TEXT-SIZE 20)
(define TEXT-COLOR "black")

;; =================
;; Data definitions:

(@htdd Countdown)
;; Countdown is Natural
;; Interp. The number being counted down from
;; CONSTRAINT: Countdown is in range [9, 0]

(define CD1 9)
(define CD2 2)

(@dd-template-rules atomic-non-distinct) ;Number

(define (fn-for-countdown cd)
  (... cd))
 


;; =================
;; Functions:

(@htdf main)
(@signature Countdown -> Countdown)
;; start the world with (main 9)
;; 

(@template htdw-main)

(define (main cd)
  (big-bang cd                   ; Countdown
            (on-tick   tock)     ; Countdown -> Countdown
            (to-draw   render)))   ; WS -> Image
            ;(stop-when ...)      ; WS -> Boolean
            ;(on-mouse  ...)      ; WS Integer Integer MouseEvent -> WS
            ;(on-key    ...)))    ; WS KeyEvent -> WS

(@htdf tock)
(@signature Countdown -> Countdown)
;; produce the number consumed subtracted by 1
;; !!!

(check-expect (tock 9) 8)
(check-expect (tock 5) 4)
(check-expect (tock 0) 0)

;(define (tock cd) cd) ;stub

(@template Countdown)
(define (tock cd)
  (if (= cd 0)
      0
      (- cd 1)))




(@htdf render)
(@signature Countdown -> Image)
;; renders the image of Countdown on MTS
;; !!!

(check-expect (render 9) (place-image
                          (text (number->string 9) TEXT-SIZE TEXT-COLOR)
                                      CTR-X CTR-Y MTS))

;(define (render cd) empty-image) ;stub

(@template Countdown)

(define (render cd)
  (place-image (text (number->string cd)
                     TEXT-SIZE TEXT-COLOR) CTR-X CTR-Y MTS))
